revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Corega |model=CG-WGR1200 |revision= |ean=4519157021531 |asin=B00CV4TSW4;JP; |price=141 |est_release_date=06/2013 |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |availability= |type=wireless router |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8197D |fla1=8 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8812AR |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8192CE |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=root |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} :[http://corega.jp/prod/wgr1200/ Product page (JP)] • [http://corega.jp/prod/wgr1200/download.htm Downloads] • [http://corega.jp/prod/wgr1200/pdf/wgr1200_detail_a.pdf Manual] <!--:Retail price: 13,600 (without tax)--> *{{WiFiCert|WFA19442|04/19/2013}}
Per ''corega'''s firmware, this device is ''[[Realtek]]'' based. :It is presumed to be using RTL8812AR.. RTL8197D is likely the SoC. :RTL8192CE is likely the 2.4GHz WiFi IC.
Additional specifications, per '''corega'''s product page, follow... *Dimensions: [[Dimensions::55 mm (W) x 160 mm (D) x 190 mm (H)]] *Weight: [[Weight::375 g]]
Per the firmware, the SSID prefix would seem to be '''COREGA_'''.
